sourcesContent:
<ion-fab vertical="bottom" horizontal="end" slot="fixed">
  <ion-fab-button class="fab-button-primary" (click)="goToReleasedPage()">
    <ion-icon name="albums-outline"></ion-icon>
  </ion-fab-button>
  <ion-fab-button class="fab-button-secondary" (click)="goToMainPage()">
    <ion-icon name="home"></ion-icon>
  </ion-fab-button>
  <ion-fab-button class="fab-button-danger" (click)="createNotificationChannels()">
    <ion-icon name="notifications-outline"></ion-icon>
  </ion-fab-button>
</ion-fab>
